snippet: Steve Jobs didn’t think so, but styluses can come in handy. Here are the pros and cons of 40 of them, some handsome and some quirky.
abstract: David Pogue State of the Art column highlights the pros and cons of 40 styluses for iPhones and iPads, some handsome and some quirky.
